description:
L2_NovaRegistry.areTokensUnlocked(bytes32) (contracts/L2_NovaRegistry.sol#476-488) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokenUnlockTimestamp == 0 (contracts/L2_NovaRegistry.sol#479)

Echidna_L2_NovaRegistry.requestExec_and_unlock_and_withdraw_tokens_should_work(address,bytes,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (contracts/echidna/Echidna_L2_NovaRegistry.t.sol#31-79) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(mockETH.balanceOf(address(this)) == (preRequestBalance - weiOwed)) (contracts/echidna/Echidna_L2_NovaRegistry.t.sol#58)

Echidna_L2_NovaRegistry.requestExec_and_unlock_and_withdraw_tokens_should_work(address,bytes,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (contracts/echidna/Echidna_L2_NovaRegistry.t.sol#31-79) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(mockETH.balanceOf(address(this)) == preRequestBalance) (contracts/echidna/Echidna_L2_NovaRegistry.t.sol#68)

description:

MockCrossDomainMessenger.setSender(address).newSender (contracts/mocks/MockCrossDomainMessenger.sol#16) lacks a zero-check on :
		- latestSender = newSender (contracts/mocks/MockCrossDomainMessenger.sol#17)
